addNetworks.title: Engeza Amanethiwekhi Esikhwameni
addNetworks.description: Chofoza noma iyiphi inethiwekhi ukuze uyengeze ku-MetaMask, Rabby, noma ezinye izikhwama ze-Web3

addNetwork.connectWallet: Sicela uxhume isikhwama sakho semali kuqala
addNetwork.alreadyPending: Isicelo sesilindile. Hlola isikhwama sakho semali.
addNetwork.error: Kwehlulekile ukwengeza inethiwekhi. Sicela uyengeze mathupha.

networkWarning.title: Inethiwekhi Engalungile
networkWarning.message: Ukuguqulwa kwethokheni kutholakala kuphela ku-BSC Chain. Sicela ushintshele ku-BSC ukuze uguqule amathokheni akho amadala.

confirmModal.title: Qinisekisa Ukuguqulwa
confirmModal.warning: Usozoguqula amathokheni akho. Sicela ufunde okulandelayo ngokucophelela ngaphambi kokuqhubeka.
confirmModal.burnExplanation: Amathokheni akho we-{{legacySymbol}} azoshiswa unomphela futhi inani elilinganayo lamathokheni we-{{newSymbol}} lizokwenziwa esikhwameni sakho semali. Lokhu akunakuhlehliswa.
confirmModal.positiveNote: Okuhle: I-{{newSymbol}} ayinayo intela nhlobo — ayisekho intela engu-10%+ kukho konke ukuthengiselana.

finalConfirmModal.title: Uqinisekile Ngempela?
finalConfirmModal.message: Leli yithuba lakho lokugcina lokukhansela. Uma us uqinisekisile, i-{{legacySymbol}} yakho izoguqulelwa ku-{{newSymbol}} futhi ayikwazi ukuguqulwa ibuyele emuva.

settings.title: Izilungiselelo
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Buyekeza i-URL ye-RPC esetshenziselwa uchungechunge ngalunye endaweni ekhethiwe.

banner.title: Omusha lapha?
banner.message: Funda nge-Freedom Bridge nokuthi ungabhangqa kanjani amathokheni we-TigerOG kuwo wonke amaketanga.
banner.note: Qaphela: Ukuguqulwa kwethokheni kungunomphela futhi akunakuhlehliswa.

hero.title: Khipha <1/> <2>Izimpahla</2> Zakho
hero.subtitle: Bhangqa amathokheni we-TigerOG ngaphandle komthungo kuwo wonke amaketanga usebenzisa i-Axelar's Interchain Token Service. Kuphephile, kuyashesha, futhi akunantela.

features.title: Isevisi Yethokheni ye-Interchain
features.description: I-Freedom Bridge isebenzisa i-Axelar ITS ukuletha isipiliyoni sebhuloho esingenamthungo, esiphephile, futhi esingenantela kuwo wonke ama-blockchain angu-{{count}}+.

stopDecay.title: Misa Ukubola
stopDecay.description: Amathokheni amadala ashisa u-10-11% wenani lakho kukho konke ukuthenga nokuthengisa. Ukugoqa ku-TigerOG kumisa lokhuopha ngokushesha, kugcina u-100% wenani lakho.

conversion.title: Ukuguqulwa okungu-1:1
conversion.description: Ukunikezwa okuphelele akushintshi nanini. Amathokheni agcinwe kwisivumelwano sokuguqula esiphephile, futhi kukhishwa okulingana ncamashi no-1:1. Akukho ukwehla kwamandla emali, akukho ukuhlanjululwa.

multichain.title: Amaketanga Amaningi
multichain.description: Khipha kanye, finyelela yonke indawo. Impahla yakho iba yithokheni ye-interchain yomdabu kuwo wonke amaketanga afaka i-Ethereum, i-BNB Chain, i-Base, nokuningi.

security.title: Ukuphepha kwe-Axelar
security.description: Inikwe amandla yinethiwekhi ye-Axelar yabaqinisekisi abahlukaniselwe izindawo. I-ITS iqinisekisa ukuthi amathokheni akho adluliswa ngokuphepha nangokungaguquguquki kuwo wonke amanethiwekhi axhunyiwe.

cta.title: Usukulungele ukubhangqa?
cta.description: Joyina uguquko lwe-interchain. Kuthatha isikhathi esingaphansi komzuzu ukuguqula izimpahla zakho bese uqala ukubhangqa nge-Axelar.

buyTokens.title: Thola Izimpahla
buyTokens.description: Awunawo amathokheni namanje? Thenga amathokheni okuqala ku-PancakeSwap, bese uwaguqulela ezinguqulweni ezintsha zamaketanga amaningi.

header.title: Amadokhumenti
header.subtitle: Funda indlela yokuguqula amathokheni amadala futhi wenze ibhuloho phakathi kwamaketanga.

whatIs.title: Iyini i-Freedom Bridge?
whatIs.content: I-Freedom Bridge iwuphrothokholi wokubhangqa owenziwe ngendlela ehlukile owakhelwe kwi-Axelar's Interchain Token Service (ITS). Ikuvumela ukuthi uguqule amathokheni amadala abe yizimpahla ezihambisana ne-interchain, ezingenantela ezingahamba ngokukhululeka kuma-blockchain asekelwayo.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Amathokheni amadala avame ukuba nezintela ezingu-10%+. Amathokheni we-TigerOG anentela engu-0%.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Hambisa izimpahla ngokushesha phakathi kwama-blockchain angu-{{count}}+ nge-Axelar.

howToConvert.title: Indlela Yokuguqula Amathokheni
howToConvert.step1: Xhuma isikhwama sakho semali kukethani lomthombo (isb. i-BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step4: Vumela inkontileka yokuGuqula ukusebenzisa amathokheni akho.
howToConvert.step5: Chofoza u-Guqula ukuze ufake amathokheni akho amadala futhi uthole inani elilinganayo lamathokheni we-"TigerOG".
howToConvert.note: Qaphela: Ukuguqulwa kubangela intela yokuthenga yethokheni endala (ngesikhathi sokuthuthukisa) uma ithokheni yakho ikhokhisa intela ekudlulisweni. Kodwa-ke, uma isiguqulelwe ku-TigerOG, konke ukudluliselwa okulandelayo namabhuloho kukhululekile kule ntela.

supportedNetworks.title: Amanethiwekhi Asekelwayo
supportedNetworks.content: I-Freedom Bridge isekela i-ecosystem ekhulayo yama-blockchain angu-{{count}}+, evumela ukusebenzisana okungenamthungo kuyo yonke indawo ye-EVM nge-Axelar.

xerc20.title: Amathokheni we-Interchain
xerc20.content: I-Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) ivumela amathokheni ukuthi akhishwe kuwo wonke amaketanga amaningi ngekheli elingaguquki kanye nokuphathwa kokunikezwa okuhlanganisiwe. I-Freedom Bridge isebenzisa i-ITS ukuqinisekisa ukuthi i-TigerOG ihlala iyimpahla eyamukelekile noma kuphi lapho ibhangqwe khona.

axelar.title: Inethiwekhi ye-Axelar
axelar.content: Sisebenzisa i-Axelar njengesendlalelo sethu sokusebenzisana. I-Axelar iyinethiwekhi ehlukaniselwe izindawo ehlanganisa ama-blockchain ahlukene, evumela ukuxhumana okuphephile kwe-cross-chain nokudluliswa kwempahla. Imodeli yokuphepha ye-Axelar ithembele kusethi yabaqinisekisi abangenamvume, inikeza ukuphepha kwezinga eliphezulu kwamathokheni we-interchain.

conversion.title: I-Logic yokuGuqula
conversion.content: Inkontileka yokuGuqula ikhishwe ku-BSC. Uma uguqula, amathokheni akho amadala athunyelwa ekhelini elifile (ashiswe unomphela) futhi uthola i-TigerOG ngesilinganiso esingu-1:1. Lena inqubo yendlela eyodwa — amathokheni amadala abhujisiwe futhi awakwazi ukubuyiselwa.

security.title: Imodeli Yezokuphepha
security.content: Ezokuphepha zakhelwe kuzo zonke izingqimba ze-Freedom Bridge:
security.point1: Ukwakhiwa kokuGuqula: Amathokheni amadala ashisiwe unomphela ngezivumelwano ezihlakaniphile eziqinisekisiwe, ezingashintshi.
security.point2: I-Axelar Validators: Imiyalezo ye-cross-chain iqinisekiswa yinethiwekhi ehlukaniselwe izindawo ye-Axelar.
security.point3: Ukunikezwa Okungaguquguquki: I-ITS ilawula ukukhipha nokushisa ukuze kugcinwe ukunikezwa okuphelele okungaguquki kuwo wonke amaketanga.
security.point4: I-Logic Ecwaningiwe: Yakhelwe kumalabhulali ajwayelekile wezimboni we-Axelar ne-OpenZeppelin.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Zonke izibalo zokunikezwa zingaqinisekiswa ngokuzimela ku-chain:

tigerogSupply.title: Ukuhlukaniswa Kokunikezwa kwe-TigerOG
tigerogSupply.intro: I-TigerOG inokunikezwa okujikelezayo okungaguquki okutholakala kuthokheni yokuqala ye-BNBTiger. Ukubalwa kokunikezwa kubheka wonke amathokheni ashisiwe futhi akhiyiwe unomphela.
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Amathokheni athunyelwe ku-0x000...dEaD ashisiwe unomphela futhi awakwazi ukubuyiselwa. Lokhu kufaka amathokheni ashisiwe ngomshini wokuqala wentela we-BNBTiger.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Inani elincane lamathokheni libhajwe kwinkontileka ye-BNBTiger ngokwayo. Lawa mathokheni awakwazi ukufinyelelwa futhi asuswe ngempumelelo ekujikelezeni.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: Ichibi lokungena le-PancakeSwap liqukethe amathokheni we-BNBTiger abhangqwe ne-BNB. Uma amathokheni we-LP eshisiwe (ethunyelwe ekhelini elifile), amathokheni ayisisekelo echibini akhiywa unomphela.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Amathokheni we-LP ashisiwe: 86.18% wawo wonke amathokheni we-LP
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ngakho-ke, u-86.18% wamathokheni ku-LP akhiyiwe unomphela
tigerogSupply.note: Qaphela: I-TigerOG igcina isilinganiso esingu-1:1 ne-BNBTiger ngesikhathi sokuguqula. Ukunikezwa okujikelezayo kwe-TigerOG kufana nokunikezwa kwangempela okujikelezayo kwe-BNBTiger ngemuva kokubheka wonke amathokheni ashisiwe futhi akhiyiwe.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Idatha Yokwethulwa: Lezi zibalo zibalwe ngesikhathi sokwethulwa. Ithokheni endala ye-BNBTiger iyaqhubeka nokushisa amathokheni kukho konke ukuthengiselana kokuthenga/ukuthengisa, ngakho-ke ukunikezwa kwangempela okujikelezayo kungase kube ngaphansi kancane kunokuboniswa.

lionogSupply.title: Ukuhlukaniswa Kokunikezwa kwe-LionOG
lionogSupply.intro: I-LionOG inokunikezwa okujikelezayo okungaguquki okutholakala kuthokheni yokuqala ye-BNBLion. Ukubalwa kokunikezwa kubheka wonke amathokheni ashisiwe futhi akhiyiwe unomphela.
lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Amathokheni athunyelwe ku-0x000...dEaD ashisiwe unomphela futhi awakwazi ukubuyiselwa. Lokhu kufaka amathokheni ashisiwe ngomshini wokuqala wentela we-BNBLion.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Inani elincane lamathokheni libhajwe kwinkontileka ye-BNBLion ngokwayo. Lawa mathokheni awakwazi ukufinyelelwa futhi asuswe ngempumelelo ekujikelezeni.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: Ichibi lokungena le-PancakeSwap liqukethe amathokheni we-BNBLion abhangqwe ne-BNB. Uma amathokheni we-LP eshisiwe (ethunyelwe ekhelini elifile), amathokheni ayisisekelo echibini akhiywa unomphela.
lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Amathokheni we-LP ashisiwe: 99.98% wawo wonke amathokheni we-LP
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ngakho-ke, u-99.98% wamathokheni ku-LP akhiyiwe unomphela
lionogSupply.note: Qaphela: I-LionOG igcina isilinganiso esingu-1:1 ne-BNBLion ngesikhathi sokuguqula. Ukunikezwa okujikelezayo kwe-LionOG kufana nokunikezwa kwangempela okujikelezayo kwe-BNBLion ngemuva kokubheka wonke amathokheni ashisiwe futhi akhiyiwe.

frogogSupply.title: Ukuhlukaniswa Kokunikezwa kwe-FrogOG
frogogSupply.intro: I-FrogOG inokunikezwa okujikelezayo okungaguquki okutholakala kuthokheni yokuqala ye-BNBFrog. Ukubalwa kokunikezwa kubheka wonke amathokheni ashisiwe futhi akhiyiwe unomphela.
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Amathokheni athunyelwe ku-0x000...dEaD ashisiwe unomphela futhi awakwazi ukubuyiselwa. Lokhu kufaka amathokheni ashisiwe ngomshini wokuqala wentela we-BNBFrog.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Inani elincane lamathokheni libhajwe kwinkontileka ye-BNBFrog ngokwayo. Lawa mathokheni awakwazi ukufinyelelwa futhi asuswe ngempumelelo ekujikelezeni.

frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Amathokheni we-LP ashisiwe: 99.31% wawo wonke amathokheni we-LP
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ngakho-ke, u-99.31% wamathokheni ku-LP akhiyiwe unomphela

header.title: Izinkontileka Ezihlakaniphile
header.subtitle: Amakheli asemthethweni wokukhishwa kwamathokheni namabhuloho kuyo yonke i-ecosystem ye-Freedom Bridge.

interchainTokens.title: Amathokheni we-Interchain
interchainTokens.description: Amathokheni we-interchain akhishwe nge-Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS). Lawa mathokheni agcina amakheli angaguquki kuwo wonke amanethiwekhi asekelwayo.

axelarNetwork.title: Inethiwekhi ye-Axelar
axelarNetwork.description: Umyalezo oyisisekelo oqinisekisa ukudluliswa kwe-cross-chain nokuqinisekisa ubuqotho bedatha phakathi kwama-blockchain ahlukene.

conversionContracts.title: Izinkontileka Zokuguqula
conversionContracts.description: Zibhekele ukuguqula amathokheni amadala abe yizimpahla ze-interchain. Lezi zinkontileka ziphatha idiphozi ne-logic yokwakha kukethani lomthombo.

conversionContractsTable.title: Amakheli Enkontileka Yokuguqula
conversionContractsTable.subtitle: Lezi zinkontileka ku-BSC ziphatha ukuguqulwa kusuka kumathokheni amadala kuya kumathokheni we-interchain.

liquidityPools.title: Amachibi Okungena
liquidityPools.description: Amachibi okungena e-DEX lapho ungahweba khona amathokheni we-OG kumaketanga ahlukahlukene.

faq.title: Ukusekela kwe-Freedom Bridge
faq.subtitle: Izimpendulo zemibuzo ejwayelekile mayelana ne-TigerOG, ukubhangqa, ne-Axelar.

cta.title: Usenemibuzo?
cta.description: Joyina umphakathi wethu ku-Telegram noma uhlole i-Wiki enemininingwane yomhlahlandlela wobuchwepheshe.

questions.a1: Ukuguqula amathokheni akho ku-TigerOG kususa intela yokuthenga (evame ukuba ngu-10-12%) ehlanganiswe nethokheni endala. Lokhu futhi kukuvumela ukuthi wenze ibhuloho lala mathokheni kwamanye ama-blockchain afana ne-Ethereum, i-Base, nokunye okuningi nge-Axelar, okuvumela ukufinyelela kuma-ecosystem amasha.
questions.a2: Yebo. Uphrothokholi usebenzisa inkontileka evikelekile yokuGuqula kanye ne-Axelar's Interchain Token Service. Uma uguqula, i-BNBTiger yakho ishisiwe unomphela futhi uthola i-TigerOG ngesilinganiso esingu-1:1. Umshini wokushisa uqinisekisa ukuthi ukunikezwa okuphelele kuphathwa kahle kuwo wonke amaketanga.
questions.a3: I-Freedom Bridge uqobo ayikhokhisi imali yokuguqula. Ukhokha kuphela izimali ezijwayelekile zegesi ye-blockchain. Ukwenza ibhuloho phakathi kwamaketanga kubandakanya imali yegesi ye-cross-chain ekhokhelwa i-Axelar ukumboza izindleko zokudlulisa.
questions.a4: Amathokheni we-TigerOG aziphatha njenganoma iyiphi enye ithokheni ye-ERC20/BEP20. Uma ulahlekelwa ukufinyelela esikhwameni sakho semali, awakwazi ukubuyiselwa. Gcina okhiye bakho abayimfihlo nemishwana yokutakula iphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi.
questions.q5: Ngingakwazi ukuguqula amathokheni ami we-TigerOG abuyele kwi-BNBTiger?
questions.a5: Cha. Ukuguqulwa kuyinqubo yendlela eyodwa. Uma uguqula i-BNBTiger ibe yi-TigerOG, amathokheni akho amadala akhiywa unomphela kwinkontileka yokuguqula. Lokhu kwenzelwe ngenhloso — I-TigerOG inguqulo ethuthukisiwe, engenantela okuhloswe ngayo ukuthi ithathe indawo yethokheni endala ngokuphelele.
questions.a6: Sisekela amaketanga amaningi we-EVM nge-Axelar, kufaka phakathi i-BNB Chain, i-Ethereum, i-Base, nokuningi. Bheka i-Wiki ukuze uthole uhlu oluphelele lwamanethiwekhi asekelwayo.
questions.a7:
Isikhathi sebhuloho sincike kunkethani othumela KUSUKA kuyo:

• Ethereum: 15-20 imiz (idinga ukuqinisekiswa okwengeziwe)
• BSC & Avalanche: 2-4 imiz (esheshayo)
• Base, Linea, Polygon: 3-5 imiz

Uhlelo lokusebenza lubonisa isikhathi esilinganisiwe ngaphambi kokuthi wenze ibhuloho.
questions.a8:
Ithokheni ngayinye ye-OG inokunikezwa okujikelezayo okungaguquki okutholakala kuthokheni yayo yokuqala ye-BNB, kubalwa amathokheni ashisiwe, amabhalansi wenkontileka abhajwe, ne-LP ekhiyiwe:

• TigerOG: ~3.66 i-septillion (36.62% yokuqala)
• LionOG: ~3.83 i-septillion (38.33% yokuqala)
• FrogOG: ~8.39 i-septillion (83.86% yokuqala)

Bheka i-Wiki ukuze uthole ukuhlukaniswa okuningiliziwe.
questions.a9: Ukuyeka inkontileka kungasusa ikhono lokuthuthukisa nokwengeza amaketanga amasha esikhathini esizayo. Nakuba inkontileka ingeke iyekwe esikhathini esizayo esibonakalayo, amasiginesha amaningi ayadingeka ukuze kwenziwe noma yiziphi izinguquko. Futhi, awekho amathokheni noma izintela ezabelwe ithimba.
questions.a10: Ibhuloho le-cross-chain lidinga ukusebenza kokukhipha/ukushisa - amathokheni ayashiswa uma eshiya iketanga futhi akhishwa uma efika. Lokhu kugcina ukunikezwa okuphelele kungaguquki kuwo wonke amanethiwekhi. Ukukhipha kulawulwa isikhwama se-multisig Safe.
questions.q11: Ingabe i-TigerOG ishiya i-BNB Chain iye ku-Axelar?
questions.a11: Cha. I-Axelar ayiyona i-blockchain - iwuhlelo lwebhuloho oluxhuma amaketanga ndawonye. I-BNB Chain ihlala iyiketanga lomsuka lapho uguqula khona amathokheni amadala. I-Axelar imane ivumela amathokheni akho ukuthi ahambe phakathi kwe-BNB, i-Ethereum, i-Base, namanye amanethiwekhi asekelwayo.
questions.a12: Qiniseka ukuthi wengeza iketanga nekheli lethokheni esikhwameni sakho semali. Ungathola wonke amakheli ezinkontileka ekhasini lezinkontileka. Ithimba le-Tiger lisebenzisa isikhwama se-Rabby esenza ukuphatha amaketanga amaningi kube lula.
questions.q13: Kungani ukwenza ibhuloho kusuka ku-Ethereum noma i-Base kuthatha isikhathi eside kangaka?
questions.a13: I-Ethereum idinga ama-epoch amabili ngaphambi kokuphothula ukuthengiselana ukuze kube nokuphepha okuphezulu. Njengoba i-Base ihlala ku-Ethereum, izuza lokhu kubambezeleka. Lokhu kubeka phambili ukuphepha ngaphezu kwesivinini - amathokheni akho aphephile, vele ube nesineke.
questions.q14: Kwenzekani uma ngihlala kuthokheni yami yokuqala futhi ngingaguquli?
questions.a14: Akukho ukuxhamazela kokuguqula. I-BNBTiger ne-TigerOG zizohlala zinama-pool ahlukene okungena, ama-market cap, nokunye. Kodwa i-BNBTiger inentela ephezulu futhi i-TigerOG ayinayo intela yokuhweba. Njengoba izintela kuthokheni yokuqala zingasetshenziselwa ukusekela iphrojekthi, ukuthuthukiswa kwenziwa yithimba le-CTO le-TigerOG. I-Freedom Bridge namaketanga amaningi kwenzelwe i-TigerOG kuphela.
questions.q15: Ingabe ikhona intela yokuguqula? Ingabe i-TigerOG inayo intela?
questions.a15: Cha. Kubiza kuphela imali ejwayelekile yegesi ukuguqula nokuhweba. Azikho izintela ezingeziwe noma izimali, futhi i-TigerOG iyinkontileka engenantela.
questions.a16: Hhayi okwamanje. Ithimba alikaqoqi izimali nezintela ukuze likwazi ukuxhasa ama-pool amakhulu okungena. Ukuze uthole i-TigerOG manje, kufanele uthenge noma ube nethokheni yokuqala bese uyaguqula. Uma usunayo i-TigerOG, ngeke ithengiswe kalula kuze kube yilapho abatshalizimali befika bezokwengeza echibini lokungena.
questions.q17: Kungani i-market cap ye-TigerOG ibukeka ikhukhumele kangaka?
questions.a17: Uma ichibi lokungena lilincane, noma yikuphi ukuhweba okuncane kwenza umthelela omkhulu ku-market cap eboniswayo. Lokhu kuyaxazululeka uma abatshalizimali befika bezoba abahlinzeki bokungena.
questions.a18: I-Freedom Bridge ayikenziwa ukucwaningwa okusemthethweni okuvela eceleni. Kodwa-ke, ikhodi yenkontileka yokuguqula isuselwe kusi-converter se-SHx esakhiwe ithimba le-Stronghold (onjiniyela bangaphambilini be-XRP ne-Stellar abasanda kwethula e-Davos). Ingqalasizinda yebhuloho inikwe amandla yi-Axelar, eyenze ukucwaningwa okuningi kwezokuphepha.
questions.q19: I-Freedom Bridge ivikela kanjani kuma-hacks noma ama-exploits?
questions.a19:
Izinyathelo eziningana zibekiwe:

• I-converter ibamba kuphela ukunikezwa okuqondile okujikelezayo okudingekayo - awekho amathokheni eqile angasetshenziswa kabi
• I-converter ayinazo izimvume zokukhipha
• Yonke ikhodi yenkontileka iqinisekisiwe ku-chain futhi ivulekile
• Izimvume zethokheni zivikelekile esikhwameni se-multisig se-Safe.global
• Ibhuloho liphathwa ingqalasizinda ye-Axelar ehlolwe empini
questions.q20: Ingabe ibhuloho alikwazi ukuhlehliswa? Kwenzekani uma ukudluliswa kwehluleka?
questions.a20: Ukudluliswa kwebhuloho kungavamile ukubhajwa ngenxa yegesi enganele noma ukuminyana kwenethiwekhi. Uma lokhu kwenzeka, ungalandelela ukuthengiselana kwakho ku-Axelarscan futhi wengeze igesi mathupha ukuze uqedele. I-Axelar inikeza amathuluzi okutakula ukuthengiselana - ngeke ulahlekelwe amathokheni akho.
questions.q21: Yiziphi izingozi ezihlobene nokusebenzisa i-Freedom Bridge?
questions.a21: Njenganoma yimuphi uphrothokholi we-DeFi, kunezingozi ezingokwemvelo ezihlanganisa ubungozi benkontileka ehlakaniphile, ubungozi bebhuloho, nokuguquguquka kwemakethe. Sincoma ukuthi wenze ucwaningo lwakho (DYOR) futhi usebenzise kuphela imali ongakwazi ukuyilahlekela. Bheka ukuzihlangula kwethu ngokusemthethweni ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe.
questions.q22: Ngingakwazi ukuguqula inkontileka entsha ye-BNB Tiger Inu (Septhemba 2025)?
questions.a22: Cha. I-Freedom Bridge isekela ithokheni yokuqala/endala ye-BNB Tiger eyethulwa eminyakeni embalwa edlule - hhayi inkontileka entsha eyenziwe ngo-Septhemba 2025. I-Freedom Bridge yakhelwe ukuthathwa komphakathi (CTO) kwamathokheni okuqala we-Tiger, Lion, no-Frog.
questions.a23: Ukwengeza ukungena kuwumsebenzi we-DeFi othuthukile onobungozi obuhlanganisa ukulahlekelwa okungapheli. Uma unolwazi ngokuhlinzeka ngokungena kuma-DEX afana ne-PancakeSwap noma i-Uniswap, inqubo iyafana - bhangqa ithokheni ye-OG nempahla eyisisekelo. Nalu uchungechunge oluhle lwemfundo mayelana nokungena uma ufuna ukufunda okwengeziwe: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oiylIHvwMik&list=PL_ujg_v1hZ5iGtiuhT8NkSMqEOaLAgmUu
questions.a24: Cha. Ayikho indlela yokudonsa umbhoxo. Awekho amathokheni noma izintela ezabelwe ithimba, futhi asiqoqi noma yiziphi izimali zebhuloho — lezo ziya ku-Axelar ngezindleko zokudlulisa. Ithimba lingabanikazi njengawe, lakha lokhu ngezindleko zabo. Isikhwama sethimba kuphela yisikhwama sokumaketha esisesidlangalaleni esixhaswe iminikelo yomphakathi. Isikhwama se-multisig Safe silawula izimvume zenkontileka njengokumisa okwesikhashana ukuthumela kumaketanga uma kunesimo esiphuthumayo, kodwa asikwazi ukufinyelela noma ukuqondisa kabusha imali yabasebenzisi.

disclaimer.title: Ukuzihlangula Ngokusemthethweni
disclaimer.subtitle: Sicela ufunde lokhu kuzihlangula ngokucophelela ngaphambi kokusebenzisa i-Freedom Bridge.

noInvestmentAdvice.title: Asikho Iseluleko Sokutshala Imali
noInvestmentAdvice.content: Ulwazi olunikezwe ku-Freedom Bridge alusona iseluleko sokutshala imali, iseluleko sezezimali, iseluleko sokuhweba, noma yiluphi olunye uhlobo lweseluleko. Akufanele uphathe noma yikuphi okuqukethwe kanjalo. I-Freedom Bridge ayincomi ukuthi noma iyiphi i-cryptocurrency kufanele ithengwe, ithengiswe, noma igcinwe nguwe. Yenza ukukhuthala kwakho futhi uthintane nomeluleki wakho wezezimali ngaphambi kokwenza noma yiziphi izinqumo zokutshala imali.

risksOfUse.title: Izingozi Zokusetshenziswa
risksOfUse.content:
Izimakethe ze-Cryptocurrency ziguquguquka futhi azibikezeleki. Ngokusebenzisa i-Freedom Bridge, uyavuma futhi uyamukela ukuthi:

• Izinkontileka ezihlakaniphile zingase zibe namaphutha noma ubuthakathaka obungaholela ekulahlekelweni yimali
• Amabhuloho we-cross-chain athwala izingozi ezingokwemvelo ezihlanganisa kodwa ezingagcini lapho: ukwehluleka kwe-oracle, ukusebenzisana kwabaqinisekisi, nokuminyana kwenethiwekhi
• Amanani ethokheni angaguquguquka kakhulu futhi ungase ulahlekelwe ingxenye noma konke ukutshalwa kwezimali kwakho
• Ukuthengiselana kumanethiwekhi we-blockchain akunakuhlehliswa
• Izimali zenethiwekhi nezindleko zegesi zingaphezu kwamandla ethu futhi zingahluka kakhulu

noWarranties.title: Azikho Iziqinisekiso
noWarranties.content: I-Freedom Bridge inikezwa "njengoba injalo" futhi "njengoba itholakala" ngaphandle kwanoma yiziphi iziqinisekiso zanoma yiluphi uhlobo, kungaba ezivezwayo noma ezishiwoyo. Asiqinisekisi ukuthi isevisi izobe ingaphazamiseki, ivikelekile, noma ingabi namaphutha. Asenzi ziqinisekiso mayelana nokunemba, ukwethembeka, noma ukuphelela kwanoma yiluphi ulwazi olunikezwa ngepulatifomu.

limitationOfLiability.title: Umkhawulo Wesikweletu
limitationOfLiability.content: Ngokwezinga eliphezulu elivunyelwe ngumthetho, i-Freedom Bridge, abathuthukisi bayo, abanikeli, nababambisene nayo ngeke babe nesibopho sanoma yimuphi umonakalo oqondile, ongaqondile, wengozi, okhethekile, olandelayo, noma wokujezisa ovela noma ohlobene nokusebenzisa kwakho ipulatifomu, kufaka phakathi kodwa kungagcini lapho ukulahlekelwa yinzuzo, ukulahlekelwa yidatha, noma ukulahlekelwa yizimpahla ze-cryptocurrency.

thirdPartyServices.title: Amasevisi Avela Eceleni
thirdPartyServices.content: I-Freedom Bridge ihlanganisa namasevisi avela eceleni kufaka phakathi i-Axelar Network yebhuloho le-cross-chain. Asinasibopho sezenzo, okuqukethwe, ulwazi, noma idatha yalaba bantu besithathu. Ukusebenzisa kwakho amasevisi avela eceleni kungaphansi kwemigomo nemibandela yabo.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Ukuthobela Imithetho
regulatoryCompliance.content: Imithethonqubo ye-Cryptocurrency iyahluka ngendawo. Wena kuphela unesibopho sokuqinisekisa ukuthi ukusebenzisa kwakho i-Freedom Bridge kuhambisana nayo yonke imithetho nemithethonqubo esebenzayo endaweni yakho. I-Freedom Bridge ayenzi zethulo mayelana nokuba semthethweni kwezinsizakalo kunoma iyiphi indawo.

dyor.title: Yenza Ucwaningo Lwakho (DYOR)
dyor.content: Yenza ucwaningo lwakho (DYOR) ngaso sonke isikhathi ngaphambi kokusebenzisana nanoma yimuphi uphrothokholi we-DeFi. Qinisekisa amakheli ezinkontileka, qonda imishini yanoma iyiphi ithokheni osebenzisana nayo, futhi ungalokothi utshale imali engaphezu kwalokho ongakwazi ukukulahlekela.

disclaimer.acknowledgment: Ngokusebenzisa i-Freedom Bridge, uyavuma ukuthi ufunde, waqonda, futhi uyavuma ukuboshwa yilokhu kuzihlangula.

disclaimerModal.title: Ukuzihlangula Okubalulekile
disclaimerModal.subtitle: Sicela ufunde futhi uqinisekise ngaphambi kokuqhubeka.
disclaimerModal.noAdvice: I-Freedom Bridge ayinikezi iseluleko sokutshala imali, sezezimali, noma sezezimali. Ukutshalwa kwezimali kwe-Cryptocurrency kuyaguquguquka futhi kunobungozi.
disclaimerModal.risks: Ngokusebenzisa le pulatifomu, uyavuma ukuthi izinkontileka ezihlakaniphile zingase zibe nobuthakathaka, amabhuloho we-cross-chain athwala izingozi ezingokwemvelo, futhi ukuthengiselana akunakuhlehliswa.
disclaimerModal.dyor: Yenza ucwaningo lwakho (DYOR) ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi usebenzise kuphela imali ongakwazi ukukulahlekela.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Kwehlulekile ukushintsha inethiwekhi. Sicela ushintshe ngesandla esikhwameni sakho semali.
